Are you on diet and want to keep track of your calorie intake everyday? Now we have the right App for you.Food Calorie List is an application containing nutritional facts of over 400 different kinds of food. For every type of food included, the following information is available for you:â Calories (kcal)â Protein (gram)â Carbohydrate (gram)â Fibre (gram)â Fat (gram)â Polyunsaturated Fat (gram)â Calories from Fat (%)â Cholesterol (mg)âââââââââââââââââââââââWHAT YOU WILL EXPECT This application has the following features:- 2-Level Category Views with THUMBNAIL preview of each item- All Category View to preview all items in alphabetical order- Single Category View to list items of the same category- Ability to BOOKMARK selected items for easier reference- A user friendly SEARCH engine- OFFLINE browsingThe application is optimized for all Android devices running on OS 1.5 or above.ââââââââââââââââââââââThis application is proudly presented by ColaKey LLC.

reviews.title: This app does NOT work!
reviews.comment: I paid for this app and it won\'t work at all it says error every time i try to open it. So disappointed!!!!!!  Especially since i paid for it !
reviews.author: jody hall
